values: we went to troon on monday evening :) me <3 her i'm really looking forward to getting a new flat with her now. i'm just wanting more space and less chaos. somewhere i'm more relaxed and can focus on my music. just had a nice relaxing bath, and i am go to bed night night

i did nothing today!

lazed about and watched the football in my bed over some live stream. still feeling a bit under the weather coz of this cold. had a bath, and moped about.

ruth's in vegas on holliday at the moment :( i miss her 

i am a pure gay. i sat in on my own and watched chocolat.

heading over to the maw's tomorrow to borrow her car. i'll have it for 2 weeks, YAY!

my head seems a lot better these days, which is good. i'm not going back to the doctor about it :)
he's rubbish anyway and threatened to put me on anti-depressants. BAD!

the knee seems to be getting a lot better, so i'm planning on starting running again, and hopefully i'll be back playing football again soon.

4 gigs in the coming 4 weeks, so i'm looking forward to that.

tomoro is a day for tidying and doing a wash. domestic bliss!

should probably go to sleep.

ho hum

i have tickets now for Maximo Park at the liquid rooms, Rock Ness, daft Punk in Paris and Connect.

woo!
night night x

things are on the up.

just played 90 min live set at Bloc. seemed to go down really well. although, some cunt got glassed after it?!

the woman who's in charge of me in my temp job was telling me i should be applying for positions there, so i think i must be making a good impression.

my
burd
is 
amazing


looks like i'll be at deaeth disco tomorrow night. GAY! :)

i am a happy blip

pah!

broadband still not appeared yet. hopefully tomorrow...

i met jeff mills after a pounding Pressure.

saw the doctor about the stress/anxiety nonsense. i've to try getting books/tapes/cds on relaxation techniques and go back in a few weeks. i don't like how he said if they don't helo he might put me on antidepressants. ICK.

Rapture on sunday. then poptimo.
then eagles of death metal on muntag.

then LCD Soundsystem on friday 9th
my birthday on saturday,
Chas and Dave on Saturday
The Youngsters At ICA on saturday
OPTIMO on sunday.

x

a whole month without drink drugs and fags.

i'm really very happy at the moment.

amazing flat. 
amazing girlfriend.
new job, again!
and some amazing techno.

oh yeah. DAFT PUNK LIVE IN PARIS IN JUNE!!!!


i have no broadband.

i have a lot of stuff i need to be doing with my music. ARGH!


i ended up in hospital 3 times in 5 days.

17" CRT monitor vs my head.

and ended up on crutches after a bad collision with someone at football.

adios

Well, Inner City Acid last night, what can i say?

well, erm...


YEEEEEEEEEEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAASSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS!


fucking topper.

i had a great set. and hunners of folk were really impressed.

the room seemed packed wae folk dancing.

going to try for a shot at death disco...

oooooh.

what a fucking amazing weekend.

one of my tracks got played at death disco.

i just can't stop winning.


not slept yet. still completely melted. away to drown self in bath prior to mother returning and seeing the nick i'm in.

i just got a phonecall from office angels saying they might not be able to get me work because i'm a scumbag.

and then i just found a runner job with the beeb, but i can't get it because i'm under 23.

not amused.

ach well, things could be worse.

randomly applying for anything on s1jobs.com was today's task.

done quite well.

should be releasing an EP rather soon on a netlabel.

and should be getting a few more gigs too.



HSBC and First Direct can go fuck themselves. I can't work there because i've been rejected a credit card in the past?!

and whit?

cunts.

Think i shall try my best to make the Optimo 9th b-day on sunday. SEXY FUCKING PARTY INDEED. can't afford pressure so i think that will be more worth the money.


anyway. i've been in an okay mood since the weekend. nae comedown. and the football last night was fucking amazing. went to my dad's to watch it wae him and my sister. 

kobai tomorrow night and morrow's birthday.


tra la la, i'm away for a very bubbbly bath, like the big queer i am.

toodle pip x

not long in from Death Disco.
been awake since yesterday. i should probably go to bed. might have a shower first though.

had a really good time indeed. and randomly met amy, who i haven't seen nor heard in over 2 years, which was really nice.

i should probably be dead.

definitely being serious man...

you wouldnt have to worry about accomodation as you could stay at our joint...fuck it might as well give it a go...

get it sorted...alex smoke is coming so why not you...

have you heard of the midnight juggernauts?...they are backing up the presets etc nowadays...they are from adelaide...crankin stuff...also cut copy as well...

i could try and hook you up with a gig with those punters?

----------------- Original Message -----------------
From: i am blip
Date: Nov 18 2006 7:52 AM


That sounds like it would be fucking amazing. You being serious? Unfortunately i'm currently completely skinto and without a job. But if i could afford it i definately would.

----------------- Original Message -----------------
From: Craig H
Date: Nov 18 2006 11:42 AM


fancy a gig in perth australia?

were starting a new electro/indie sort of night...

i'm serious. were basically promoting local electro acts etc...were getting a monthly spot in a fairly prominent venue over here...you could be a big time international act...guaranteed crowds of about 150 which is capacity but it'll escalate.

let us know
it's a realplayer video, but it's a classic old school tv clip borat's nearly finished downlaoding. yas! working tomoro. in edinburgh but. BOO!

i'm so fucking sick of not having a job.
i keep applying for things but not hearing anything back.
the woman at the jobcentre last week said they only really have one temp thing available at the moment, and i wouldn't get any money until the new year.
i'm trying to make a new cv using the CV builder on the careers website, and i can't do it. i don't know how to fill in parts of it. i get can get a degree but i can't use a CV builder that's designed for folk with little to no qualifications. great.

slept in. again. i set my alarm so i've had plenty of sleep, but i keep sleeping in.

generally getting really fucking frustrated and pissed off with life.

i had 4 voicemails which i couldn't read until i got home about 1am. meh. need to top up my phone.

meh. meh. meh.

there was some good to come of today. looks like one of my tracks will be getting played at death disco on saturday.

i dreamt someone got run over by either the 263 or the 255, it was quite graphic.

ho hum.

my hands totally seized up there after that run.

fuck me it's cold out there.

huzzah 3 miles in about 25 mins. that will do me.

so that's me at 9 miles in 3 days... i don't know if i'll bother tomorrow seeing as it's pendulum at night

i've got my shorts and that on again.

time for 3 mile run number three i think!!

christ it looks cold outside.
i need a shower. then to bed. going for a run tomorrow.

TODAY IS WEDNESDAY?!

i've been thinking it was thursday all day.

fuck sake.

my must be completely minced.

i might go to the zutons after all.

hmmm.

no wonder emma was so confused when i was asking if my hair cut was "tomorrow friday".

another run tomorrow then methinks.

that's me ran 6 miles in two days.
down to the bottom of bothwell and back is 3 miles.

it's fucking amazing just thinking about nothing at all for half an hour.
getting out of the house and away from everything for half an hour or so is fucking magic.
i can't run wearing my glasses or they'll fall off, so i can't see anything either.
just running in a wee bubble.

i was supposed to go to the XFM zutons gig at the liquid rooms.
it would have been quite cool as it's an exclusive one, but to be honest, right now i can't be fucked with it, or anything to be honest.

ach well.

odd.

i need to phone someone about the boiler and smell of gas.

going for another 3 mile run.

it's cold
it's dark
it's wet.

and i'm away for a run.

something must be wrong with me

better go have a shower and make some sandwiches for the gig.

meh.

Click for info on acts playing, running times and maps of where the venues are What is STFU Glasgow? STFU Glasgow is a 3 day music festival now running for its second year, which is part of the larger stfu network that has arranged festivals and gigs in towns and cities across Europe. The aim of Stfu is to showcase up and coming electronic musicians, djs and visual artists. The event brings together people from all over the globe who make many different styles of music in many different ways. It kick's off tonight, and i'm hoping to make it over to see some acts i've heard a lot of good things about. and it's FREE, which is always a bonus. the link at the top takes you to the homepage which has maps and running times, and also info on the acts playing the weekend. personally i can't wait for my set on sunday night, as it looks like it could be a really good weekend. x
was crossing over the river from the secc to XFM's studio just after 7 this morning and glasgow looked so pretty. so i took some pictures on my phone... very, very, very cold though.

i fucking hate christmas.

it really does get to me at times.

1. Do the drugs make you happy or are they a cover up for low-ness? Oooft. that's a rather heavy question to kick of with. Well i suppose it's a bit of both. I do feel quite down a lot at the moment and going out and getting mad wae it helps. but at the same time, even if i feel really good, i really enjoy getting mad wae it. And the fact that there's usually hunnners of my mates out with me, and we're out having a great laugh. i went out lots and lots during the 2 week detox and i did have a lot of fun, but i knew it would be just a wee bit better if i wasn't detoxing. 2. When have you been the happiest? i don't know when i've been the happiest of late, but i know the most contented i've been in the last wee while is when i just wandered away from a party or something and sat on my own watching the world go by. i quite like sitting in my wee bubble watching the world pass me by. just understanding that on the grander scale of things we mean absolutely nothing, and accepting it. i don't like thinking about things a lot though. i tend to get confused by things. 3. Do you enjoy being single? nah. my head's totally fucked up at the moment. and even if it wasn't, i do have the pulling power of a coma victim. FACT. but it's something i grew used to after 19 years of it. heh. 4. Do you like boys? No. Contrary to popular beleif i am not a homosexual, i am not a drug dealer, and i do not have special needs. 5. If I asked you to close your eyes and hold out your hand, would you do it willingly? Yeah.

Corrine Bailey Beige can suck my arse.

she's fucking pish. i'm going to shit into a Q magazine and send her it.

thom yorke's probably turning in his grave

i crumble like a fucking digestive biscuit.

i'm moving to the antartic, they have penguins and snow.
you better be coming to see my gig on sunday night, or i'll set mr Keith "Hardcore" Harcus on you... you have been warned x

London (abridged):

* quarter to 5am rise after 4 hours sleep
* in london for about 2pm after drive down
* driving round in circles
* hitting cars with a bouncy ball
* talking politics to a texan whilst mad wae it
* talking shite at the toilet attendant
* soho with no shoes
* getting mugged at knifepoint
* hunners of folk in a 4 person hotel room.
* 2hrs sleep
* rab's suicidal driving coming back out of london
* the godsend that is burger king
* front tyre blowout on the m74 home about 50 miles south of hamilton.
* the pretty stars
* i survived, maybe only just at times, but i'm still here, so woo!

hmmm, something has come to light recently.

initially i felt slightly embarassed by this, but why should i care.

i like My Chemical Romance.

i'm 21 for fuck sake.

ha ha ha. ach well, it could be worse...

i feel dirty... wait, no... I FEEL FILTHY. much better.

ARGH!

fuck off monster.co.uk

i'm trying to create a profile to help me find a job.

i don't know what kind of job i want.

this is fucking infuriating.


i think i'm going to head to my bed.

goodnight.
i had a bath. now to bed. run away!

saturday - Death disco + 3 litres of asda red bull + 1 can red bull = sore heart. manhattan project were good. but headliner justus konche was utter shite. he played slow disco and house and couldn't mix at all. it was a really bizarre DD all round. although it was a great laugh being out with my mates.

sunday - ended up killing off the detox and heading to POPTIMO. met john, lucy, holly, frew, slevin who were still going from saturday night. had muchos fun. went to holly's mate jessica's wee brother's flat. tenious link indeed. met some really sound new folk. got more fucked up. drank hunners of vodka. it quickly became monday.

monday - went on an underground adventure to see a dog owner. went back to the flat and partied more. went to the brunswick cellar's for a drink and then i was going to get the train home. holly's mate couldn't make Hot Chip so i got a free ticket. headed to the arches where i got uber searched. they found no nonsense on me ^-^ and in i eventually got. holly's mate jessica, who'd not taken anything all day, had her bag emptied, and they found a half in a filter tip pack. and then there were 3. the sound and the crowd for hot chip were shite. you couldn't drink whilst watching the band either. and me, john and holly must have been the only 3 folk dancing in the whole place. went to macsorley's after for a quick drink. everything hit me at once and for 5 mins i felt completely monged. then jumped on the last train with holly and walked home.

today/tuesday - slept. woke up, pottered for an hour, then returned to bed. accies won 3-1 so we're joint top, and celtic won 3-0 too. i burned my rice and when i was running down to the kitchen to see what was burning i took a chunk out the base of my heel. just about to have a bath.

i start work tomorrow doing PR for XFM, at the AFI gig at the barras. really looking forward to it.
need to go for a wander down hamilton with some CVs. Need job.

generally i'm quite confused by things as a rule. and at the moment i'm trying my best to understand what's going on in my head. sometimes one thing will push me in one direction, then the next minute the same thing will pull me the other way. it's extremely frustrating for me, and everyone around me.

meh.

I LOVE TECHNO on saturday.

*dances*

great night :)

these folk too are the owners of a shite face. YALDY! i am in a good mood today. na na na. just about to go for a shower and maybe do some tidying and maybe cook dinner. it's suzie's birthday, so i may steal the meep meep and go to the ABC for a bit, or maybe go visit my sister. day 5 of being aff the skag. WOO!

too much caffeine, too much red bull. and very wide awake still.

went to the club NME thing. Data Rock were really good. Shitdisco were, well, shit. and the Klaxons were fucking class.

ended up in the catty wae POR. laughed heartily at kids trying to dance to electro. met hendo, jo, and claire. dropped POR home and bombed it back home to sit still wide awake talking to naebdy on the net :(

think i'll get up and tidy tomorrow, maybe build some of my costume, and maybe go for a run.

i'm really looking forward to the detoxing. i felt really good for being a good boy tonight, even though i did drink too much redbull/pepsi/irn bru and have been pissing continuously for it.

today was day 4.

VIVE LA REVOLUTION!

Yas, i think all the sleeping has fended off the cold or whatever i was coming down wae. and i feel a lot happier today! woo! in the last maybe hour or so my mood has fucking rocketed. maybe it's something to do with the POUNDING FUCKING DRUM AND BASS! well and having great friends that care a lot about me ^-^ posted my shit away to XFM to confirm my acceptance and my driving details so i can abduct emo kids with mary in the XFM jeep. got a message from a guy sorting the STFU Glasgow Electronic Music festival type thing. I'm really looking forward to it. It's 3 days off free electronic music! i'm playing for an hour on the sunday, and at 10pm! fucking yaldy! and also... mummy just put me on her insurance until january. WOO! i think i might drive to the arches tomorrow night for the club NME thing and be a good boy like i need to be so i can sort me head out. so i can now drive my mum's car when she let's me and i think i've got me dad's brand new mazda6 2.0 sport for a week soon. it's good timing for me to stay sober! FUCKING YALDY! i've missed listening to drum and bass. it's like audio prozac! *bounces* i think i may go for a walk/run/cycle later on.

you wake up choking in the middle of the night nd discover your face like this... my throat hurts today because of it, and i spent the first few hours of being awake feeling rather sick. might build some of my halloween costume today. and fill in my acceptance letter for the job. also need to have bath, and eat all the bacon and all the rolls.

ah ha ha ha. just woke up.

what happened this weekend?

got home today to find a letter from XFM and i have a new job! whooray!

fuck sake, i did the ryan smith drug rant this morning. argh.

Cheers erin.

the whole weekend merged into one big blur of munt for me.

things i can actually remember:

edingburgh being a pure shite place.
a bit massive lorry being IN the street round from the venue.
pissing out the kobai bus as rab speeds along the m8.
a pots and pans rapture cowbell collective that got the polis phoned.
8am booze run.
another destruction of charlotte's flat.
another pair of boxers ruined. (and me showing everyone)
randomly busting into tears in the living room for no reason.
having to sit in the bath whilst someone took a shit.
kirsten's fucking topper of a punch.
there were HUNNERS of gayers. two of them were fighting all the way from camphill to that crazy anne's flat. it was fucking hilarious.
said crazy burd nearly getting killed by a truck.
missing the train 3 times.
finding pills constantly about my person.
much talk of feltching, babpiping and general buggery.
getting back to my house today and taking my sock off and discovering ANOTHER white tablet of happiness.

the walk of shame was actually not too bad today. i think it was because it was a sunday for once and hamilton was dead.

i think i'll no doubt be awake for the next few hours doing fuck all.

ho hum.


No poptimo tonight unfortunately, as i am a poof and can't handle a 4 day bender this weekend.

cheers everybody, especially nicola for sitting talking to me for ages when i did my now weekly "andy goes completely sideways for an hour or so"!
